visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Click categories to search'. The x-axis should have categories 'Foo', 'Bar', and 'Foobar', with labels that are clickable links to specific search queries. The y-axis should display a single series of data points [29.9, 71.5, 106.4]. The chart should have custom styling for axes and labels, including specific colors and font sizes. Additionally, configure the chart with custom colors for the series and other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Click categories to search'. The x-axis categories are 'Foo', 'Bar', and 'Foobar', each linked to specific search queries. The y-axis displays a single series of data points [29.9, 71.5, 106.4]. The chart includes custom styling for axes and labels, with specific colors and font sizes. The background color of the chart is set to a light gray (#f9f9f9), and margins are adjusted for better spacing. The series color is set to a blue shade (#0073e6), and the legend is enabled with custom styling for better readability.
